how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Journalling;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: No, my TiddlyWiki is for personal use only
putting it all together, what value does: Simple note-taker, cross-platform, easy to use, no bloat.
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I have customised TiddlyWiki through options and plugins
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki through web browser with Download Saver (default saving mechanism)
how do you back up/sync changes between: Consumer online storage (e.g. Google Drive, Dropbox)
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: Not adding too much, making sure what is added works properly,
what could we do better? prompts for thi: Better keyboard-based navigation would be nice.  I also use simplenote and would actually prefer to do everything in TiddlyWiki but it currently easier to navigate solely by keyboard in SImpleNote.  To-Dos could improve without much complication as could calendar-based events.
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
